DOC.brief_summary: The use of plate in addition to autologous bone is better then stand alone cage fusion regarding fusion rate and segmental lordosis.
DOC.brief_title: The Comparison Between the Stand-alone Cage and the Autologous Iliac Bone Graft/Anterior Plating in the Single-level Surgical Treatment of the Cervical Spine
DOC.detailed_description: cage: MC+® cage plate: atlantis® plate
DOC.criteria: Single level degenerative cervical spine disease aged 30 70 no improvement of symptom for 8 weeks of nonsurgical treatment. degeneration in other levels without stenosis, accepted osteoporosis disease with poor bone quality Cancer Previous cervical spine surgery Multiple levels disease Ossification of posterior longitudinal ligament Kyphosis at the index level Developmental stenosis (diameter of C7 spinal canal < 10mm)
